af-desc: Provides a set of pure parser functions that operate on arrays
af-config-foreach-iteration-limit: The maximum total number of iterations that can be performed by #af_foreach.
af-config-max-range-size: The maximum number of elements that an array constructed using #af_range may contain.
af-config-enable-error-tracking: Whether to track and propagate errors to parent ArrayFunction parser function invocations.
af-error-category-desc: There was an error processing the ArrayFunctions parser functions on the page.
af-error-incorrect-type: Could not match expected type $1 with actual type $2 for parameter $3 ("$4").
af-error-template-does-not-exist: The given title $1 does not exist.
af-error-template-loop-detected: Expansion of $1 would cause a template loop.
af-error-max-range-size-exceeded: The maximum range size has been exceeded.
af-error-foreach-iteration-limit-reached: The maximum number of iterations has been reached.
